h2_title: Where to Find the Green-Capped Martialist
content: When you reach a cliff with some braziers, look down to find a spot to drop into a large open cave with a large Buddha Statue.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Green-Capped_Martialist.md', within the main section titled 'Green-Capped Martialist', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Green-Capped Martialist'.
The content is as follows:
When you reach a cliff with some braziers, look down to find a spot to drop into a large open cave with a large Buddha Statue.
